author: David A. Embury
description: Looks and tastes great but is a load of hassle to make.
name: Abacaxi Ricaço
recipeIngredient: 90 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the top off a small pineapple and carefully scoop out the flesh from the base to leave a shell with 12mm (½ inch) thick walls
Place the shell in a freezer to chill
Remove the hard core from the pineapple flesh and discard; roughly chop the remaining flesh, add other ingredients and BLEND with one 12oz scoop of crushed ice
Pour into the pineapple shell and serve with straws
(The flesh of one pineapple blended with the following ingredients will fill at least two shells)
